00009 //AlnConstants::AlnConstants(bool desy, bool data) {
00010 AlnConstants::AlnConstants(int period, int dataType) {
00011 
00012   assert(sizeof(AlnConstants)==
00013          sizeof(int)*numberOfInts+
00014          sizeof(float)*numberOfFloats+
00015          sizeof(double)*numberOfDoubles);
00016 
00017   memset(this,0,sizeof(AlnConstants));
00018 
00019   if(period == 0) {//period
00020     _tdcUnit=1.0; // 1ns
00021     
00022     if(dataType == 2) {//dataType
00023     /*
00024     for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00025       double offset(50.0*(i-0.5));
00026       _zLayer[i][0]=-  50.0+offset;
00027       _zLayer[i][1]=-1150.0+offset;
00028       _zLayer[i][2]=-2060.0+offset;
00029       _zLayer[i][3]=-3160.0+offset;
00030     }
00031     */
00032     
00033     // X drift velocities per layer
00034       _vDrift[0][0]= 0.0300;
00035       _vDrift[0][1]=-0.0312;
00036       _vDrift[0][2]= 0.0308;
00037       _vDrift[0][3]=-0.0300;
00038       
00039       // Y drift velocities per layer
00040       _vDrift[1][0]=-0.0300;
00041       _vDrift[1][1]= 0.0306;
00042       _vDrift[1][2]=-0.0312;
00043       _vDrift[1][3]= 0.0300;
00044       
00045       /*
00046         for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00047         for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00048         if(i==0) _vDrift[i][j]*=1.01;
00049         if(i==1) _vDrift[i][j]*=0.97;
00050         }
00051         }
00052       */
00053       
00054       // X corresponding to time = 0
00055       _cTzero[0][0]=-_vDrift[0][0]*1310.0;
00056       //_cTzero[0][1]=-_vDrift[0][1]*1116.0;
00057       _cTzero[0][1]= 34.0;
00058       //_cTzero[0][2]=-_vDrift[0][2]*1183.0;
00059       _cTzero[0][2]=-35.8;
00060       _cTzero[0][3]=-_vDrift[0][3]*1020.0;
00061       
00062       // Y corresponding to time = 0
00063       _cTzero[1][0]=-_vDrift[1][0]*1209.0;
00064       //_cTzero[1][1]=-_vDrift[1][1]*1165.0;
00065       _cTzero[1][1]=-35.0;
00066       //_cTzero[1][2]=-_vDrift[1][2]*1113.0;
00067       _cTzero[1][2]= 34.3;
00068       _cTzero[1][3]=-_vDrift[1][3]*1055.0;
00069       
00070       for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00071         for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00072           _cTzero[i][j]/=-_vDrift[i][j];
00073         }
00074       }
00075 
00076     } else {
00077 
00078       _vDrift[0][0]= 0.03;
00079       _vDrift[0][1]=-0.03;
00080       _vDrift[0][2]= 0.03;
00081       _vDrift[0][3]=-0.03;
00082       
00083       _vDrift[1][0]=-0.03;
00084       _vDrift[1][1]= 0.03;
00085       _vDrift[1][2]=-0.03;
00086       _vDrift[1][3]= 0.03;
00087 
00088       for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00089         for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00090           _cTzero[i][j]=1200.0;
00091         }
00092       }
00093     }
00094 
00095 
00096   } else {
00097     _tdcUnit=25.0/32.0; // 40MHz clock subdivided by 32
00098 
00099 
00100     /*
00101     for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00102       double offset(29.0*(i-0.5));
00103       _zLayer[i][0]=-  29.0+offset;
00104       _zLayer[i][1]=- 680.0+offset;
00105       _zLayer[i][2]=-2528.0+offset;
00106       _zLayer[i][3]=0.0;
00107     }
00108     */
00109     
00110     // X drift velocities per layer
00111     _vDrift[0][0]=0.2;
00112     _vDrift[0][1]=0.2;
00113     _vDrift[0][2]=0.2;
00114     _vDrift[0][3]=0.0;
00115     
00116     // Y drift velocities per layer
00117     _vDrift[1][0]=0.2;
00118     _vDrift[1][1]=0.2;
00119     _vDrift[1][2]=0.2;
00120     _vDrift[1][3]=0.0;
00121     
00122     // X corresponding to time = 0
00123     _cTzero[0][0]=-_vDrift[0][0]*0.0;
00124     _cTzero[0][1]=-_vDrift[0][1]*0.0;
00125     _cTzero[0][2]=-_vDrift[0][2]*0.0;
00126     _cTzero[0][3]=0.0;
00127     
00128     // Y corresponding to time = 0
00129     _cTzero[1][0]=-_vDrift[1][0]*0.0;
00130     _cTzero[1][1]=-_vDrift[1][1]*0.0;
00131     _cTzero[1][2]=-_vDrift[1][2]*0.0;
00132     _cTzero[1][3]=0.0;
00133   }
00134 
00135   for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00136     for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00137       _vDquad[i][j]=0.0;
00138     }
00139   }
00140 }

00142 double AlnConstants::cTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {
00143   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00144   return _cTzero[d][l];
00145 }
00146 
00147 void AlnConstants::cTzero(unsigned d, unsigned l, double c) {
00148   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00149   _cTzero[d][l]=c;
00150 }

00152 double AlnConstants::vDrift(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {
00153   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00154   return _vDrift[d][l];
00155 }
00156 
00157 void AlnConstants::vDrift(unsigned d, unsigned l, double z) {
00158   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00159   _vDrift[d][l]=z;
00160 }
00161 
00162 double AlnConstants::vDquad(unsigned d, unsigned l) const {
00163   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00164   return _vDquad[d][l];
00165 }
00166 
00167 void AlnConstants::vDquad(unsigned d, unsigned l, double z) {
00168   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00169   _vDquad[d][l]=z;
00170 }
00171 
00172 double AlnConstants::coordinate(unsigned d, unsigned l, int t) const {
00173   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00174   //const double tns(t*_tdcUnit-_cTzero[d][l]);
00175   //const double tns((t-_cTzero[d][l])*_tdcUnit);
00176   const double tns(t-_cTzero[d][l]);
00177   return _vDrift[d][l]*tns+_vDquad[d][l]*tns*tns;
00178 }
00179 
00180 int AlnConstants::tdcValue(unsigned d, unsigned l, double c, double t) const {
00181   assert(d<=1 && l<=3);
00182 
00183   // Polynominal expansion; avoids quad=0 problems and wrong solution
00184   const double s(c/_vDrift[d][l]);
00185   const double q(_vDquad[d][l]/_vDrift[d][l]);
00186   //double tdc((t+_cTzero[d][l]+s-q*s*s+2.0*q*q*s*s*s)/_tdcUnit);
00187   //double tdc(_cTzero[d][l]+(t+s-q*s*s+2.0*q*q*s*s*s)/_tdcUnit);
00188   double tdc(_cTzero[d][l]+(t+s-q*s*s+2.0*q*q*s*s*s));
00189 
00190   // An int always rounds towards zero so compensate
00191   if(tdc>=0.0) tdc+=0.5;
00192   else         tdc-=0.5;
00193 
00194   return (int)tdc;
00195 }
00196 
00197 std::ostream& AlnConstants::print(std::ostream &o, const std::string &s) const {
00198   o << s << "AlnConstants::print()" << std::endl;
00199   o << s << " TDC unit = " << _tdcUnit << "ns" << std::endl;
00200 
00201   for(unsigned i(0);i<2;i++) {
00202     if(i==0) o << s << " X dimension:" << std::endl;
00203     else     o << s << " Y dimension:" << std::endl;
00204     for(unsigned j(0);j<4;j++) {
00205       o << s << "  Layer " << j
00206         << ", t at coordinate=0 = " << std::setw(6) << _cTzero[i][j]
00207         << " TDC units"
00208         << ", drift velocity linear = " << std::setw(8) << _vDrift[i][j] 
00209         << " mm/TDC unit"
00210         << ", quadratic = " << std::setw(6) << _vDquad[i][j] 
00211         << " mm/TDC unit^2" << std::endl;
00212     }
00213   }
00214 
00215   return o;
00216 }
